MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in School Lane and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.04AM on 8th November 2020.
